alert.note: Alert for Kankakee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 21 at 8:10PM CST until further notice by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...Along the Kankakee River from near Kankakee upstream to near Sun River Terrace, including portions of Kankakee county. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...Flooding of yards, park land, and roads along the river. Shifting of ice may damage structures along the shore. Localized water level fluctuations may also occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 803 PM CST, satellite imagery indicates an ice jam extending from the Schuyler Avenue bridge in Kankakee upstream to Beckman Park. Flooding will continue while the ice jam remains in place. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kankakee, Aroma Park and Sun River Terrace. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: A Flood Warning means flooding is imminent or may already be occurring. Persons along rivers, creeks, and other waterways should take immediate precautions to protect life and property.
